content: this pattern is created byy cchhaassssiittyy ooqquueennddoo iiff yyoouu hhaavvee aannyy pprroobblleemmss wwiitthh tthhiiss ppaatttteerrnn pplleeaassee eemmaaiill mmee at chassityoquendo@aol com ffoorr mmoorree ppaatttteerrnnss vviissiitt 77ppoollkkaaddoottss eettssyy ccoomm tttthhhhiiiissss ppppaaaatttttttteeeerrrrnnnn iiiissss ffffoooorrrr nnnnoooonnnnccccoooommmmmmmmeeeerrrrcccciiiiaaaallll uuuusssseeee oooonnnnllllyyyy pppplllleeeeaaaasssseeee ddddoooo nnnnooootttt sssseeeellllllll mmmmyyyy ppppaaaatttttttteeeerrrrnnnn iiiinnnn aaaannnnyyyy wwwwaaaayyyy sssshhhhaaaappppeeee oooorrrr ffffoooorrrrmmmm bbbbuuuutttt yyyyoooouuuu aaaarrrreeee mmmmoooorrrreeee tttthhhhaaaannnn wwwweeeellllccccoooommmmeeee ttttoooo sssseeeellllllll aaaannnnyyyy ffffiiiinnnniiiisssshhhheeeedddd pppprrrroooodddduuuucccctttt yyyyoooouuuu hhhhaaaavvvveeee mmmmaaaaddddeeee tttthhhhaaaannnnkkkk yyyyoooouuuu mmmmaaaatttteeeerrrriiiiaaaallllssss nnnneeeeeeeeddddeeeedddd these pieces are made of worsted weight yarn and caron s simply soft but you can use any yarn you choose crochet hook size f the bottle measures about 6 inches gauge not necessary for pacifier polyester fiberfill yarn needle for weaving in ends aaaabbbbbbbbrrrreeeevvvviiiiaaaattttiiiioooonnnnssss blo=back loop only flo=front loop only bbbboooottttttttlllleeee with white for milk or you can use orange for juice work in the round not joining every round use a stitch marker to mark row round 1 make a magic loop and single_crochet 6 in the loop 6 sts round 2 single_crochet twice in each single_crochet around 12 sts round 3 single_crochet 1 single_crochet twice in next st around 18 sts round 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet twice in next st around 24 sts round 5 blo single_crochet around round 6-24 single_crochet around change color to any color for the cap this pattern is created by chassity oquendo if you have any problems with this pattern please email me at chassityoquendo@aol com for more patterns visit 7polkadots etsy com round 25 slip_stitch in ea st around this creates a clean edge for the cap single_crochet around in ea st from prev round 24 slip_stitch 24 single_crochet round 26 slip_stitch in flo of ea st in prev round this creates an edge like a bottle cap single_crochet in blo of same round 24 slip_stitch 24 single_crochet round 27 single_crochet around stuff bottle with polyester fiberfill don t over stuff or the bottom will bow out and the bottle won t stand up switch to color for bottle nipple round 28 single_crochet around round 29 decrease around 12 sts round 30 single_crochet decrease around 8 sts round 31-33 single_crochet around fasten_off leaving a long tail stuff the remainder of bottle with polyester fiberfill use yarn needle to close up end ppppaaaacccciiiiffffiiiieeeerrrr bbbbaaaasssseeee with any color for pacifier base work in the round not joining every round use a stitch marker to mark row round 1 make a magic loop and single_crochet 6 in the loop 6 sts round 2 single_crochet twice in each single_crochet around 12 sts round 3 single_crochet 1 single_crochet twice in next st around 18 sts round 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet twice in next st around 24 sts round 5 single_crochet 3 single_crochet twice in next st around 30 sts this pattern is created by chassity oquendo if you have any problems with this pattern please email me at chassityoquendo@aol com for more patterns visit 7polkadots etsy com slip_stitch in ea st around hhhhaaaannnnddddlllleeee row 1 attach same color to the side with the sl sts slip_stitch a loop around a single_crochet
